results.hit: Target is @Condition[Dead]{dead}, @Condition[Ruined]{ruined}, and their @Wiki[Core:Size]{SIZE} is reduced by 2. If their @Wiki[Core:Size]{SIZE} was already 2 or less, their body is completely consumed.

overview.base: You gain @Ability[Offensive Martial Arts]{Offensive Martial Arts} and @Ability[Defensive Martial Arts]{Defensive Martial Arts}.
You gain @Ability[Bite]{Bite} and become @Core[Fluency Bonus]{fluent} in it. Additionally, your @Equipment[Mouth] is @Property[AV0]{AV0}.

You must mana drain at least 3 creatures to death every day or you start taking penalties. If 24 hours pass and you have not fed, you lose your your largest hit die and mana die. Your HP and MP maximums decrease by the value of those dice. For each additional 24 hours you go without feeding, you lose your next largest hit die and mana die. To restore lost hit dice and mana dice, you must feed more than normal. If you feed on at least 6 creatures within a 24 hour period, you restore 1 lost hit die and mana die.

You count as being @Keyword[Undead]{undead} for the purposes of @Wiki[Category:Abilities]{abilities}, @Wiki[Category:Damage types]{damage}, and other @Wiki[Category:Effects]{effects}. You also gain @Ability[Ethereal Senses]{Ethereal Senses}, @Ability[Healing Sensitivity]{Healing Sensitivity}, @Ability[Impure Durability]{Impure Durability}, @Ability[Mana Drain Grasp]{Mana Drain Grasp}, @Ability[Undead Mind]{Undead Mind}, and @Ability[Undying Durability]{Undying Durability}.

overview.proficient: The @Condition[Poisoned]{poison} instead deals [[/roll 1d8[toxic]]] @Core[Damage]{damage}.
overview.fluent: The @Condition[Poisoned]{poison} instead deals [[/roll 1d10[toxic]]] @Core[Damage]{damage}.

results.hit: Target is @Condition[Poisoned]{poisoned}. The @Condition[Poisoned]{poison} deals [[/roll 1d6[toxic]]] @Core[Damage]{damage}.

overview.base: You always have at least 1 AV. This is the case even when you are not wearing armor.
You can see and hear spirits and @Condition[Ethereal]{Ethereal} creatures.

@Core[Healing]{Healing} can be used to @Core[Damage]{damage} you. If the creature providing you @Core[Healing]{healing} specifies that they are doing so "for damage" then you roll your largest @Wiki[Core:HP]{hit die} and take that much @Damage[Holy]{holy damage} instead of the normal @Core[Healing]{healing} effect. This does not consume any of your @Wiki[Core:HP]{hit dice}.
You are @Keyword[Immunity]{immune} to non-@Damage[Magic]{magic} non-@Damage[Silver]{silver} @Core[Damage]{damage}.

results.hit: Deal [[/roll 1d8[mana]]] @Wiki[Category:Drain types]{drain} to the target. If this @Condition[Dead]{kills} the target, you @Core[Revitalizing]{revitalize}.
results.critHit: Deal [[/roll 2d8[mana]]] @Wiki[Category:Drain types]{drain} to the target. If this @Condition[Dead]{kills} the target, you @Core[Revitalizing]{revitalize} twice.

overview.base: You are @Keyword[Immunity]{immune} to being @Condition[Frightened]{frightened} or @Condition[Charmed]{charmed}.

You are @Keyword[Immunity]{immune} to @Condition[Unconscious]{unconsciousness}, @Condition[Suffocating]{suffocating}, and being @Condition[Poisoned]{poisoned}. You do not @Condition[Down]{drop} due to being at negative @Wiki[Core:HP]{HP}. You still @Condition[Dead]{die} when you reach half your maximum @Wiki[Core:HP]{HP} below zero. You also do not have to @Core[Drowning]{breathe}.

Your @Equipment[Hand]{hands} count as @Wiki[Category:Weapons]{weapons} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be @Property[Shattered]{shattered} or @Property[Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @Core[Attack Interaction]{attack} with them and their damage die is now [[/roll 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d8]].

overview.base:
Your @Equipment[Hand]{hands} count as @Wiki[Category:Shields]{shields} for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be @Property[Shattered]{shattered} or @Property[Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @Core[Block Interaction]{block} with them and their @Wiki[Core:Block Value]{BV} is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands @Property[Blocking]{blocking}.

Your @Equipment[Mouth]{mouth} counts as a @Wiki[Category:Weapons]{weapon} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be @Property[Shattered]{shattered} or @Property[Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @Core[Attack Interaction]{attack} with it and its damage die is now [[/roll 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d8]].
